interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NiegMeag 20 Inch Kinky Curly Bundles Wave 1 Human Hair 8A Grade 100% Brazilian Unprocessed Virgin Remy Extension Weave Natural Black Can Be Dyed and Bleached, Bundle
Review Date: 2021/12/19
Store: NiegMeag
Product Description: ["Hair Texture: Curly Wave Human Hair Bundles.Material: 100% Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair.Human Hair Type: Brazilian Remy Human Hair. Weave Hair Human Bundles.Color: Natural Black ColorUnit Weight: 1 Bundles ,95-100g/piece.Hair Weft: Machine Double Wefts.Can Be Permed: Yes,But Please Be Careful Not to Exceed 125°F ! Otherwise it Will Damage The Hair !Hair Smell: It May Have Local Shampoo Smell, but It Will Disappear Fast After Co-Wash, Don'T Worry.How To Take Care Of The Hair?1. Wash The Hair Regularly.2. Detangle Hair Gently Before Washing. Do Not Rub or Twist It.3. Add Mild Shampoo To Cool Water and Swish Hair Till Clean. Rinse Thoroughly.4. Blot Out Excess Water With Towel and Allow Hair to Dry Naturally. Do Not Expose to The Sun.5. Comb Hair Gently With Wide Toothed Comb or With Your Fingers . 6. Brush Straighter Hair in a Downward Motion Straight With The Ends. FAQ:Q1: Will It Shedding?A1: For New Hair, A Few Strands of Hair Initial Shedding is Normal Like Our Own Hair. The Hair is Double Machine Weft to Avoid Shedding.Hair Shedding Can Be Caused by Many Things. Heat Damage From Blow-Dryers, Curling Irons, And Flatirons, As Well As Coloring Will Result in Breakage.Q2: Return/Refund Policy?A2: You Can Return to us if You or Your Family Doesnt Like Our Hair .But Don'T Break The Package."]
Average Rating: 1.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'NiegMeag', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Installation Type': 'Weave', 'UPC': '679265464058'}
Review Text: Very bad quality hair
Review Title: Bad quality
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

This is not Human hair. I received a blend of synthetic hair. This was false advertisement. Not good.

It was very thin and stringy, not good quality. I put one bundle on and I am sure it is not human hair. I returned the package back to the seller for a refund. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Purchase Preference:** The user remains committed to human hair extensions, particularly curly textures, but has encountered significant disappointments with recent purchases from new brands, maintaining a heightened skepticism towards product claims.

- **Quality Expectation:** The user has a steadfast expectation for softness, durability, and a natural look in hair products. Recent experiences have revealed serious discrepancies in quality and authenticity, reinforcing their demand for superior products.

- **Rating Trend:** The user's satisfaction ratings continue to reflect serious dissatisfaction, marked by low ratings stemming from consistent issues with product quality and misleading advertisements. This pattern indicates an increasingly critical stance toward brands that fail to meet expectations.

- **Brand Affinity:** While the user remains open to trying new brands, they now approach potential purchases with increased scrutiny due to recent experiences with false marketing claims.

- **Hair Color Preference:** The user prefers natural hair colors, consistent with their previous choices.

- **Length Preference:** The user typically favors 18-inch extensions but is open to experimenting with longer lengths, as seen in their recent purchases.

- **Interaction Style:** Frustration and disappointment dominate the user's latest reviews, signaling a clear shift from their earlier positive feedback. This change highlights a more discerning and critical evaluation of hair products moving forward.

Overall, the user has become increasingly discerning and cautious in their hair product purchases, insisting on quality and transparency in marketing due to multiple unsatisfactory experiences.
